author's_name_(_зохиогч): AER TE NI CHOS RJE BDUN SKYES SHES SPRUL SKU LCAM SRING,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (CES PA 'DI NI SBYANG GI GNOD CHEN LA SEG MAS CAN THAMS CAD LA BYAMS PA SNYING SEMS BSKYED LA MA H'A KDA LA SPRUL PA'I SKU GSUM SKYES SHES RIN PO CHE BLA MA BSKUL BA'I NGOR, AER TE NI CHOS RJE BDUN SKYES SHES SPRUL SKU LCAM SRING ZHAL GZIGS BLA MAS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD DON DU RTA PHYUGS RNAMS LA SPYANG GI GNOD PA MANG PA'I PHYIR DU KHRO BO CHEN POS DON ZHES BYA BA SHIN TU RNYID DKA' SLAD DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN NO, ,)
